page.title: 12Watford: Legend
page.content:
In Watford, about 100 years ago,a woman who did not believe in God said,"If God exists, when I die a fig tree will grow out of my heart". She died about thirty years later and was buried in {St.Mary's Church Watford.}As the years passed people noticed that a shoot had begun to grow out of the side of the grave,and in about five years a fig tree had formed and was growing against the church wall. It was soon fenced off, a plaque was put up telling the story, and many people came to see it.
Now the plaque has gone and the fig tree chopped down but even now one side of the grave is very slightly open.
